name: The Monkey Wrench Conspiracy
storyline: The Monkey Wrench Conspiracy transports you into an intergalactic world where the evil "Dr. Monkey Wrench" has hijacked the Copernicus space station. As Moldey the secret agent dispatched to deep space to rescue the hijacked space station, you must design everything you need to survive and carry out your mission starting with the simple trigger you'll need to destroy your opponent. If your design is flawed, your fate is doomed!
summary: The Monkey Wrench Conspiracy "mod" puts you in the role of an intergalactic secret agent dispatched to deep space to rescue the Copernicus station from alien hijackers. It is a complete tutorial for a complex technical product, designed to teach industrial engineers how to use new 3-D design software.
